title: Agreements that betrayed Sri Lanka : 2002 Ceasefire Agreement
content: – by Shenali Waduge – Winning hearts and minds of terrorists, mentality of surrender, advocating theory of “unwinnable war” and policy of appeasing, reducing the country to a pariah state, knowingly giving a terrorist organization status on par with a sovereign state and a democratic government were the characteristics of those led by Ranil Wickremasinghe…
